perfect_opt1 (volrelax_to_vasp)
    perfect_opt2 (volrelax_to_vasp)
        perfect_stat (vasp_to_phonon)
            perfect_phon (phonon_to_phon)
                perfect_phon_parse (phon)
        inducedefect1 (induce_defect)
            defect1_opt1
                defect1_opt2
                    defect1_stat (vasp_to_phonon)
                        defect1_phon (phonon_to_phon)
                            defect1_phon_parse (phon)
        inducedefect2 (induce_defect)
            defect2_opt1
                defect2_opt2
                    defect2_stat (vasp_to_phonon)
                        defect2_phon (phonon_to_phon)
                            defect2_phon_parse (phon)
        inducedefect3 (induce_defect)
            defect3_opt1
                defect3_opt2
                    defect3_stat (vasp_to_phonon)
                        defect3_phon (phonon_to_phon)
                            defect3_phon_parse (phon)
defect1_stat (vasp_to_neb), defect2_stat (vasp_to_neb)
    neb_1-2_opt1 (neb_to_neb)
        neb_1-2_opt2 (neb_to_nebstat)
            neb_1-2_stat (nebstat_to_nebphonon)
                neb_1-2_phon (phonon_to_phon)
                    neb_1-2_phon_parse (phon)
defect1_stat (vasp_to_neb), defect3_stat (vasp_to_neb)
    neb_1-3_opt1 (neb_to_neb)
        neb_1-3_opt2 (neb_to_nebstat)
            neb_1-3_stat (nebstat_to_nebphonon)
                neb_1-3_phon (phonon_to_phon)
                    neb_1-3_phon_parse (phon)
